Plot: A midlife crisis compels former frat brothers to reunite at Spring Break to film footage for their hastily conceived smart phone game, Bikini Girls Behaving Badly.
Title: Last Spring Break
Writer: Michael Dardant, Sean Gerowin (story), Armando Leduc
Actors: Michael Dardant, Armando Leduc, Michelle Nicolette Kowalski, Marisa Welles
